website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, mid-priced thermometer that offers 2 simple ways to take a child's temperature fast.
pros: Features ear and forehead modes and is easy to use and clean
Registers results with vivid temperature readouts within just a few seconds
We love that the screen lights up in different colors that coincide with the severity of a fever
cons: Although it's mostly reliable, customers occasionally gripe about inaccuracies
A few thermometers stopped working within a few months of ownership

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms of little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Love the option to scan the forehead!! Great for fussy baby that doesn't want his mouth or ear messed with.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this thermometer, I was hoping, praying even, that it would actually be accurate. Every thermometer I have tried has been so inaccurate and it is frustrating when you have a sick child. I was so pleasently surprised when I got this in the mail and it came with easy to use instructions, a soft storage bag, and it actually worked! I tried the ear and head option on myself, and my son, and both readings were super close and seemed like a normal temperature! To use the ear feature you just remove the blue top and it reveals the ear part. The light is also nice for nightime temperature taking! I am so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: It came on time. The packaging was nice so it kept the product in good condition. The thermometer has easy to understand instructions and it is easy to use and extremely accurate. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is not accurate. I’ve had it for a month. It was at first, and I really liked it, but it’s terrible now. I do one ear and I get 104.3. I do the other and I get 100.1. I do a forehead and I get 98.6. Super frustrating, especially because I waited too long to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm Lucky
customer_reviews.text: I'm very lucky to find it on Amazon, nice and perfect results
customer_reviews.author: Tahseen Alattar

customer_reviews.title: Take your temp at night without turning on a light!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the versatility of this product. You can scan either the forehead or inside the ear. I also love the color coded temperature light that glows behind the actual number. You can tell whether to be worried based on a red or orange color before you ever register the actual number. The color glow and light is a much better feature than the forehead scanning thermometer I currently use because I'll be able to easily read my child's temperature in the night while he's asleep without having to leave the room or turn on a light to see his temperature like I do now.
customer_reviews.author: Uhoh's mom

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, read (and save) the instructions, but this is Easy to use. Don’t wait until your family members are ill, become familiar with it when it arrives. I found the temps from ear and forehead only .6 degree difference, certainly good enough to let me know if it’s time to call the doctor. Not a bad idea to note the “normal” temps for family ahead of time too.
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp

customer_reviews.title: Consistent. Consistently inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: Consistent. Consistently inaccurate. Regularly runs 2 degrees high showing low grade fever when actually 97. Cross checked it twice at physician's office. Trying to monitor low temp. difficult with inaccurate thermometer. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: iPROVEN DIGITAL EAR THERMOMETER REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Wow, is all I have to say about this product. I was babysitting my niece who is two years old and cannot stay still for short periods of time. She was really under the weather and I very easily took her temperature by swiping this thermometer across her forehead and sure enough she was running a fever. I did not have to place this thermometer inside her ear, just had to swipe it across her head and I immediately got her temperature. Great thermometer and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sanchez Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Super Inaccurate! Its better to guess than use this product
customer_reviews.text: We are returning product. Forehead tests are inaccurate and it's probably better to guess temperature with hand on forehead. We tried the product enough times to give it a chance. But with two different readings between tests ranging as much as 2 degrees apart it can never be trusted. In fact, all tests showed cooler than normal body temperature. Ear tests are a joke. 77 degrees F! I guess the tester believes the person has died.
customer_reviews.author: Grono

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer doesn't show the temperature accurately. I use it in Celsius mode and when I have a normal temperature 36,6 it shows 36,9 on my forehead and 37,1 in my ears. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the new model. Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. I can't get an ear reading to save my life and I'm not sick. I just had the flu. I can't imagine using it if I'm sick. Plus it's supposed to be the new model and it's not. Bait and switch. It's going back on Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read screen and large buttons
customer_reviews.text: Pros Large buttons, screen easy to read, works extremely fast, clear and concise instructions, came with batteries and nice draw string pouch, would be great for moms with a sick baby. Cons Will turn on inside pouch if you hit a button which waste battery, needs on/off switch, easier way of going from ear to forehead with adapter. All in all, I like the product and would recommend for sure, but there are a few tweaks needed.
customer_reviews.author: vjoyana

customer_reviews.title: Not for all babies
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product and counted down the days until it's arrival. I was very disappointed when i got it though. First of all, I felt like I was putting a straight jacket on my baby. It broke my heart from the start. Still giving it a chance I tried it a few times and my newborn hated it. I could tell he felt trapped and I think the arms were too small for him. Give it a try, but don't expect it to be the magical solution.
customer_reviews.author: Brtrackchick

customer_reviews.title: So much quicker & easier than oral thermometers
customer_reviews.text: This device has options for obtaining your temperature using an ear probe, or forehead scan. It works in just seconds! Nice pouch for storage when not in use. Easy to follow instructions. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: VVB

customer_reviews.title: Seems decently accurate; good enough for my home use
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer does take getting used to, and I've gotten a few times when I get readings that are more different than a few degrees. However, I usually am able to get successive readings that are less than 0.5 deg apart using the same method (i.e. 2 ear readings). I do tend to use the ear function more since I feel like it's ironically easier since my 1 year old sometimes moves while I'm doing the forehead reading. I did bring it once with me to the doctor's office to compare to their reading (they used forehead), and I believe it was within a degree.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Not super accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quick reading on this! Not a bad price, the packaging it great I loved the little bag it comes to carry it in. But the reading isn’t super accurate. I used it three times in a row and they were not just one degree difference it was 4 or 5 degrees difference. So not super thrilled with that. The entire point is to be able to rely on the thermometer and as a mom that worries me that I would miss a bad fever.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working correctly after 4 months and in that time frame for 2 illnesses with fevers. The ear reading doesn’t work it says my temp is 91.7 and flashes red. the head reading is very inaccurate in comparison to an oral temp reading. It’s off by 2 degrees. Also tried new batteries. Seemed convenient at first but seeing as how it didn’t even last a year and now in the middle of the night when your little one has a fever and it won’t read correctly hugely inconvenient. Don’t buy this! A reliable thermometer is important with kids don’t go cheap. Luckily I have another thermometer that works but not as easy as a temporal/ear.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D

customer_reviews.title: very inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I had a Braun forehead thermometer that worked great, but my toddler dropped it, and the new version I bought was awful. I bought this one on wirecutter's recommendation. It seemed good at first - it takes the temp quickly and my kids don't mind it at all - but it is really not accurate or consistent at all. I regularly get readings on the same kid at the same time of +/- 2 degrees. It's pretty frustrating, since I have young kids and need to know whether or not they can go to school, need meds, need to go to urgent care...I'll be shopping for something else.
customer_reviews.author: A. Motley

customer_reviews.title: Comically Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Received this product today, took the time to read the instructions, and then tested it out. Using the "head" method, my family's temps ranged from 70-85 degrees. Using the "ear" method, our temps ranged from 100-102 degrees. I then used our old Braun ear thermometer and our temps were all in the 97.5-99 range (i.e., normal), with the same results on an old-fashioned under the tongue mercury thermometer. I'm sorry to have relied on all of the great reviews for this product. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Boylan Clark

customer_reviews.text: It's hard to rate this one. The forehead swipe seems to be the same as when I measure with a classic thermometer in mouth. So I'm happy about that. But the ear part...that seems very hard to do + inaccurate and never the same reading when doing it couple times in a row. You are supposed to pull your ear down and back and aim at your ear drum but this seems incredibly awkward and hard to ace. And the reading is way off so i'm obviously doing something wrong. But I'm happy the forehead swipe is good. It's the easiest way anyways.
customer_reviews.author: dotpsc

customer_reviews.title: take the average of the top 4 temps to get your temperature
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer told me my toddler had 108 temperature last week and I just about dropped everything and ran him to the ER when it wasn’t needed. If I want to get an idea of what my toddler’s temp is, I have to take it about 4 times and figure it’s somewhere in the middle of all 4 numbers. How can it be so innacurate when it only has one job?! I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Hit and Miss
customer_reviews.text: The looks and the build quality are good. It seems to be a hit and a miss sometimes because we have to be moving it right over the forehead to get the right reading. Sometimes it does not give the correct reading, but sometime it gives out fine. Had to do it multiple time s to consider a average temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Viswa

customer_reviews.title: Good product but falls a little short for my preferences
customer_reviews.text: I really like that you can use the same thermometer for ear and forehead readings. I didn't like that there are 2 separate buttons. The head button is kind of low making it feel a little awkward to hold while taking that temp. I wish you could get disposable covers for the tip so you don't have to clean it after each use. Other than those 2 things, it's a decent thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: C8

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Neat little thermometer. Seems to take accurate temps with the forehead being about a degree different than the ear (which is what is expected). Only complaint is that the cover is very difficult to get back on after an ear check. It requires a very accurate lineup and my son nearly snapped off part of the plastic trying to do so. Otherwise, nice sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this thermometer was going to be great based on the reviews. However, I have read the directions thoroughly and done everything they have said. My kids' temps have not even registered as 98.6 once. I have known they have had fevers, but they are coming out less than the average body temp? This doesn't seem right.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very easy to use right out of the box! There is a quick demo video to show the correct use of the two methods, and after that it was very easy to use, and I had consistent result over multiple readings. For younger children, the forehead feature is fantastic for those who are sleeping or wouldn’t want something in their ear.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Walker

customer_reviews.title: Proven Dual Thermomter
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for its value. Numbers are clearto read & functions quickly. Appears to be pretty accurate, ear to head temperatures do not differ much. Instructions are ready to follow. Comes w/a convenient faux-suede soft case to hold the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Nice and handy, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight accurate you can either use on forehead or in the ear.. it comes with a storage bag. The only thing that’s a small drawback is I would like it to have a little cushion to it so when you scan the forehead of an infant you don’t worry about scratching thier little head . Not that it will but just in case it’s just plastic not rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pisarski

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Very inaccurate. Would give a totally different number with 10 seconds between reads. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! until it stopped working after 4.5 months!
customer_reviews.text: Ok i don't normally write bad reviews but the last thing i want to worry about is whether my thermometer is functioning in the middle of the night when my 2 year old is sick. this worked fantastic while it worked. we ordered in November and it broke in early April and now shows everything is 86 degrees. Its a thermometer so it doesn't get daily use...maybe 30 times total while we had it. really liked it when it worked but now i don't have one and am starting the search over again. Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Callie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works But...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one other Temporal Forehead Thermometer. The last one worked really well for about 5 years. This one is strange. It takes the temperature but it's awkward to use. I'm sure there is a better product out there.
customer_reviews.author: concerned sister

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust readings from this thermometer!!
customer_reviews.text: Horribly inaccurate. Bought this for my newborn and after cross-checking it with his temperature at the doctors office-both the ear and forehead reading were at least 2 degrees off. Also forehead and ear readings never match each other—I’ve had them read up to 5 degree differences at times! I will NOT be trusting this product anywhere near my family. Unfortunately, like another reviewer, I discovered these inaccuracies a few days after the return period was over so I’m stuck with it—but it’s going right in the trash and I immediately bought the thermometer the pediatrician recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crap, and it's not the only one. I don't know why I bothered to buy a different brand of forehead thermometer in the first place. They ALWAYS read low. My son had a 102 fever and this thing said 98 on the head and 97 in the ears! Don't BOTHER, get an oral thermometer and if you've got a baby, use a rectal. You'll at least get an accurate read!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This product looks professional and seems to function well. It can provide temperatures from forehead and ear, and switching between modes is very simple -- just a matter of changing your finger placement on the device. It can also provide temperature readings for room air. It is very lightweight and fits that hand well when scanning.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Hester

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!! Accuracy is a joke!
customer_reviews.text: Had been wanting to get an ear thermometer for a while and ended up buying this one based on all the high reviews. BIG MISTAKE! It consistently does not work and the accuracy is a joke at best! When I received the thermometer I read the instructions through thoroughly (and continued to review them during my struggles with this thing!). My head measurements ranged between 94.1F - 95.6F. And all of my ear measurements were coming back in the low - mid 80°F range (hypothermic), and I've been sick as a dog for the last week! Will be returning this product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE!
customer_reviews.text: Sure it’s easy to take your temperature and read the result (red=fever, yellow=mild fever, green=normal), but I bought this because it was supposedly accurate, but it’s not. I can take my same temp in the same ear multiple times and get 3 very different results varying by 1-2 degrees each time, which can make a big difference. Now it reads 94 degrees as a fever (red). I haven’t even had it a year. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Wiesmann

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Easy. Fast.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works great. I love how it has the dual function to take the temperature different ways. It makes it so easy to check my kids temp esp. while they sleep. It let's me know if they have a fever even if I cant read the number by the color display. My 12 year old can even take his own temp with ease. Simple. Straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: LDVP

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this thermometer. Instructions are easy to read & follow. It comes very well packaged as well. Taking a temp is quick and easy, even in the dark. The storage compacity is great for when you need to see how temps are progressing. I will be recommending this thermometer to all my family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo White Owl

customer_reviews.title: Great product specially for babies.
customer_reviews.text: This product is helpful to measure temperature in 2 different ways. First through forehead which will give you temperature in 3 seconds and 2nd through ear which will just give you temperature in a second. You can also change from Fahrenheit to Celsius and vice versa. You can store up to 20 readings as well in it.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works. Seems to be reliable and accurate! I returned one that was not accurate, so this was definitely a better choice for me. Needed it mainly for the grand babies that I care for.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Are you green, yellow, or red? Let this thermometer show you!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have been doing surveys and received a notice asking me to test some new items. This thermometer is the first one I have received. I LOVE IT! It works on the forehead or in the ear. It not only displays the temperature, but lights up green, yellow, or red to let you know if the temperature is normal, slightly high, or very high. I am very excited and thankful to have the opportunity to test this awesome thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Digital Ear Thermometer/Forehead Scanner All-in-one
customer_reviews.text: I really like this easy to use compact product. It can do a quick forehead scan to get initial temperature and if you wish to be more precise, you can remove the protective head and do an ear temperature. Convenient drawstring carrying case is included to keep sensor clean and damage free but also allows instructions to easily be kept w/thermometer
customer_reviews.author: JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Needs calibration
customer_reviews.text: Every temperature read has been consistently 1 degree higher after taking temp at doctors, but could just be a calibration issue. Easy to use though and not a bunch of pieces so it is hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Ggreenwood12

customer_reviews.title: The numbers are also large enough to read and I like the colored background colors for elevated temps or when ...
customer_reviews.text: Works quickly but a bit cumbersome on forehead when using it on self. Using the ear piece made it easier. The numbers are also large enough to read and I like the colored background colors for elevated temps or when normal. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is made well and easy to use. It comes with a nice storage bag and easy to follow directions. I really like the quick guide that shows the color indicators and what they mean. Being able to use it in the ear or on the forehead is great for different ages and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great thermometer I wish I would have gotten one years ago. I have arthritis in my hands but this is lightweight and easy to use. It lights up in easy color indicators also to help you pay attention to your temperature.
customer_reviews.author: LisaD129

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I like many aspects of this product, like the color display and the ability to take temperature on the forehead and in the ear. The forehead method has never been reliable, even as an indicator, and the in ear method will often give different temperatures in the right ear than the left one (by several degrees). In all, I am very disappointed in this thermometer. Having a spouse battling stage 4 cancer, I need a reliable thermometer. I was hoping to find one that is reasonably priced, but this is the second one I have purchased that is highly inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Very inaccurate... it worked for a couple weeks and after that I can’t get a consistent read- I’m talking inconsistencies of 10 degrees or more. I’ve read the instructions. It just said my son’s temperature was 85 degrees Fahrenheit. It’s all over the place. It’s also supposed to light up different colors depending on temp... it just lit up red when it said my temp was only 96??? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hoping this would be a long term solution for our kids. When we got it, it worked great! It's been a little more than 3 months and everyone's temperature is 84.4 degrees. Find another Thermometer because this one is not worth the headache when you need it most.
customer_reviews.author: Rio P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It is versatile, can be used to take temperature via your ear or forehead. The display is digital and gives an accurate reading instantly.
customer_reviews.author: dwramage

customer_reviews.title: cant trust the reading
customer_reviews.text: tried in succession and received different temperature readings. Believe this can be dangerous if a parent is trying to make a decision about sending their child to school or calling in sick for work. It looks like a decent product. Possibly received a lemon. Use an old fashion mercury thermometer now
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ivester

customer_reviews.title: good tympanic thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the tympanic portion, not the temporal (in my experience they have been highly inconsistent), and so far, I like it! At first it didn't work, but I realized that it was because I had to replace the batteries (the battery protector must not have been properly placed). But once I put new batteries in, it worked great! Comes with a nice little storage bag, and no need to buy thermometer covers, just wipe clean with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Thermometer is awesome. Great for infants and kids who wont sit ...
customer_reviews.text: This Thermometer is awesome. Great for infants and kids who wont sit still to have their temperatures taken orally. One swipe across the forehead or a few seconds in the ear and you have a reading. No reading a small thermometer it has big digital numbers for even grandma to read without glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Readings
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed :( I debated for about 3 weeks on this or another more expensive. I read review after review and finally decided to try this. It’s very nicely made but is completely inaccurate. I will check a temp in the ear and it will say 102 and I won’t move it at all and check again and it will say 99. Then again and will says 98. It’s completely random and basically useless! Super disappointed I wasted my money on this. :(
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few thermometers over the years. I am so glad that this one works as advertised and does both the forehead reading as well as the ear reading. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check temperature without fuss
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer allows you to read from the forehead(less accurate) or from the ear(more accurate). Either way it is fast and painless. And easier than the kind you stick in the mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Martin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Does not take accurate temperature. I followed the list of 10 different items in order to get an accurate reading and still not accurate. Returned this the next day and got another brand. Works flawlessly, and without the 10 step procedure to get my child's temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer and the way you can use it to take a temperature with out touch. It will even take a room temp!. It's great the way it lights up in red, yellow or green to let you know in a hurry if the temperature is too high.
customer_reviews.author: doghog

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than two months
customer_reviews.text: For the first few weeks, this thermometer worked great. It was accurate and easy to use. Then it stopped giving accurate readings by several degrees. Unfortunately, we discovered this when my daughter came down with the flu. It was obvious that she had fever, but the thermometer consistently read somewhere around 95 degrees. Unfortunately, it's too late to return it. Save yourself the hassle, and go with a different thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would! Total waste of money- complete junk! It’s readings come back between 79-83 degrees. Completely inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thermometer to use for our toddler. Pretty accurate, but you have to make sure you are using it correctly
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great value for easy to use, quick thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer can be used two different ways. The hear is supposed to be more accurate but I tested it on both my forehead and ear and the result was much closer than the potential margin of error.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. I am a nurse and like to have similar tools at home to care for my children, so I chose this item and it has been great, especially the fact that I can switch from ear to forehead when needed. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t give you an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I’ll finally get a normal reading thermometer, but this is another “toy thermometer” . Not recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine - NY

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer was not very accurate to begin with. However, after only a few weeks of using, it stopped working. The thermometer would read a temperature of 94.5 for my daughter, and when I tested it on myself, it read 93.2. I knew my daughter wasnt feeling good so I took her to the doctor anyways. She actually was running a fever of 101.8! Returned this product immediately!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Does not work! It reads 97.8 no matter how you use it. It worked for the first few times I needed it. Now that the return window has closed it has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B. Furneaux

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and versatile
customer_reviews.text: The children were delighted not to have something in their mouth when mom needed to take their temperature. The digital thermometer is quick and accurate - I tested it on myself.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. It can be used on the forehead and the ear. It is super fast, only taking a few seconds to give you a reading, which is great when you have sick children.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Halloway

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This is an acceptable thermometer. Accuracy could improve, though. I usually get +/- .4 degree difference when I do 5 readings in a row on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Becki S.

customer_reviews.title: Hope it will last , nice feature with dual measurements
customer_reviews.text: Just received the thermometer seem to be accurate with measurements between the ear and forehead.
customer_reviews.author: kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all... complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We've never been able to get accurate readings on this and it changes each time it's used. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Must need item in the home with children
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item because it was very easy to use. If you can't read the numbers its color coded to alert you if the number is high. It has 2 buttons ear or head very easy. A must need if you have children in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Either this thermometer doesn’t work or I’m dead
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer fails in both modes to provide an accurate temperature. Currently, I’m 89.3 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Lint

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thermometer based on reviews and couldn’t be more disappointed. Temperature stuck on 95 degrees no matter if it’s ear or forehead. Read the directions multiple times. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tinaclaire

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: One of the main things I like about this thermometer is the convenience of use. It is fast and efficient, can be used on infants using ear or forehead. The numbers are easy to read. I would recommend this for anyone who has children. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Can get light to come on for ear temp.
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to light up with the ear readings only the head. Plus not sure how to go back for recent readings. It just me a number in the 70’s. I was really looking forward for something that was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Macfiggen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate. I compared it to a rectal thermometer and it kept telling me my sons temp was normal when if fact it wasn’t. I could tell he had a fever just from touching him. Rectal temp was 103.5 and this useless device still said his temp was 98.5. Missed return cutoff by 5 days, such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: not so crazy cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: I received this thermometer and thought it was similar to another one I have that I purchased on Amazon awhile back. But this one is different because it actually gives accurate temperatures. I love having a choice in how to temp (forehead scan or ear). I also really like how it comes with a little carrying pouch.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: All over the place
customer_reviews.text: Temperature readings are all over the place. Taken one minute to the next can vary several degrees.
customer_reviews.author: lindseybh

customer_reviews.title: Ear and head feature
customer_reviews.text: Product was well packed and arrived on time. I like the packaging that protects it well. The fact that you can use it for the head and ear is a great feature. The color change is a nice touch for easy reading!
customer_reviews.author: Karine Z

customer_reviews.title: Natural and easy
customer_reviews.text: Loved this thermometer. Having the dual head or ear function is awesome. The color function gives a good indication as to when to be concerned. Very smart and not too expensive
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Worst thermometer on the market
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. It never was accurate. I am following the directions to the T and I have all different readings. Stick to the old fashion thermometers. Just clean well with alcohol. Your always guaranteed an accurate response.
customer_reviews.author: carleen

customer_reviews.title: Conveintent
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn't disturb or irritate children or Infants, Our daughter freezes when she hears the clicking with the Head setting its pretty funny. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Harvey

customer_reviews.title: It is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Multiple times this thermometer have not detected a fever on either the forehead or ear setting. It is not useful due to this as my 2 year old had a fever that was not detected till we went to the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helpful little contraption
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it can be used in two different ways - ear and forehead. It is convenient because of it's dual purpose, and is easy to use. I did notice a discrepancy in the ear temperature, but it could be that I was not holding the ear properly to get an accurate reading. All in all, a good purchase for families.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Showalter

customer_reviews.title: This thermometer is great to have on hand in case you need to take T of a guest
customer_reviews.text: I like this thermometer because it does not require oral insertion so can be used freely on guests, strangers, babies, etc. if a situation comes up. It's instant and display lights up in different colors to reflect the severity of the condition. Thermometer has a nice feel to it and fits nicely in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I used this when I was sick , I was clearly feverish, but it gave me 97.4 ear measurement . Also it gives many different readings at the same time
customer_reviews.author: G.buyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product.Easy to use with just a swipe of the wand and very accurate/I think everyone should have one of these.I will be recommending this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: deknoffloch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! I decided to spend more to get an accurate reading for my two young children. Disappointed to realize this thing isn’t even close to accurate. You get a different reading every time and sometimes it’s not even close to the normal tempature. Don’t waste your time and money. Will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Great new color feature!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! I love the fact that I can take my temperature in the dark and tell by the color of the screen if I need to be concerned without having to try to locate my glasses to see the numbers!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if it was remotely accurate.
customer_reviews.text: It read my son's fever at like 100 but I knew he was hotter. Measured rectally at 103. That's way too much variation for my comfort level. Don't trust the readings at all.
customer_reviews.author: Doucette Family

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and accurate. Don't really use the Ear function. Best to use when they're sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Mmckee

customer_reviews.title: Proven thermometer Couldnt ask for a better product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: love this easy to use thermometer. nice big light up numbers. warning colors to judge temp. Two ways to use. All the way around a really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quick
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast it is. Handy, small enough to carry in a purse, diaper bag, backpack, or just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: TexRose57

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money,buy a different temporal reader
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't. Readings are all over the place, it's hard to rely on this for a temporal reader. Ear reader won't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Stumpf-Athey

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This came just as a bad cold was hitting our house, it made checking the 2 yr old and 6 month old’s temperatures a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kjon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money & not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this thermometer. It is unreliable, which is a serious problem when a parent is trying to determine whether their child has a fever. I have compared the temperature taken by this one with multiple others and it is consistently 1-3 degrees off. I have had it for two months and I am throwing it away. Wish I wouldn’t have purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Seems to have consistent reliable readings. Hard to assess validity as I nothing to gauge against. But useful enough for home use with sick kids. Does the job well
customer_reviews.author: RichCS

customer_reviews.title: I love the color guide
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thermometer, it helps those who aren’t sure if a fever is too high to know if they should be concerned by colors, easy to use, and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kivuvu83

product_meta.title: Best Medical ympanic Fever Scan Lens Technology for Unmatched Accuracy - New 2018 - DMT-316
product_meta.description:
Looking for a reliable thermometer for the entire family?

Our DMT-316 is the solution for spot-on temperature measurement at any age.

Here’s what our thermometer will bring you:

 * Super fast and easy measurements: forehead measurement in just a swipe (3 seconds), ear measurement in just a click (1 second).
 * Consistent results: thanks to advanced clinical testing, you can rely on our DMT-316. It will give you consistent results, over and over again. No need for double- or triple checking anymore!

With a few little extras

 * A pouch for clean and easy storage
 * A colored display, indicating if a fever is at play - even in the middle of the night

Order today, our DMT-316 won’t let you down! We strive to deliver exactly what you need. If you’re not 100% satisfied, you will get a hassle-free refund within 100 days from your purchase. No questions asked.
feature_bullets: RELIABLE RESULTS. OVER AND OVER AGAIN - Our DMT-316b medical thermometer has been extensively clinically tested. To make sure you get consistent and accurate results.
EASY TO USE - Choose between the Forehead and Ear mode depending on your preference, to get readings in just seconds.
NO MORE GUESSWORK - The display lights up in green, orange or red, depending on the measured temperature. So you know when to take action.
CONVENIENT FOR ALL AGES - This fever thermometer will bring you pain-free measurements in just seconds. For your entire family, from newborns to adults.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
